changeSet.createView: SELECT md.station_id, md.commodity_id, md.mean_price, md.buy_price, md.stock, md.stock_bracket, md.sell_price, md.demand, md.demand_bracket, md.status_flags, md.prohibited, md.timestamp FROM validated_market_datum_view md INNER JOIN ( SELECT station_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM validated_market_datum_view GROUP BY station_id ) md2 ON md.station_id = md2.station_id AND md.timestamp = md2.latest_timestamp;
